channel.title: Tax Diner
channel.description: Conversations with tax professionals about what works and what doesn't in the tax services business.
channel.itunes:summary: Tax attorney Chris Bushong chats with tax professionals about their hard-won knowledge, professional challenges, and insights into the changing market for tax services. We'll cover the issues most pressing to small and medium tax firms, from business practices to technology to where to get a deal on stamps.
channel.itunes:author: Chris Bushong

item.title: Pilot Episode - Michael Diyanni of La Jolla Tax
item.itunes:author: Chris Bushong
item.dc:creator: Chris Bushong
item.description: Michael Diyanni is a tax attorney and part time digital nomad. His practice, La Jolla Tax, provides tax services to small business owners.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tax and Yoga in the Cloud
item.itunes:summary: In our inaugural episode, Chris talks to Mike Diyanni about running a tax firm while teaching yoga in Peru.
